description: The Bamboo Stylus mini is a super portable stylus with a clean design available in six fashionable colors. Its soft touch finish feels good in the hand. The responsive nib ensures a natural pen experience on screen. It is convenient to attach the stylus with its strap to the audio jack of a Smartphone or tablet. Unlike most competitor styli, it is 25% smaller and made of durable high quality materials and has a replaceable tip.
title: Wacom Bamboo Stylus Mini for iPad/iPhone/iPod Touch/Kindle (Mini White)
